intent_atoms.description: Outline the additional downstream parser follow-ups now unlocked by real-time streaming events (e.g., catalog integration test coverage and fallback handling).
Wire the console formatter into an inspect command so validation summaries appear in the CLI pipeline.

functional_units.name: Downstream Parser Follow-Ups
functional_units.description: Provides real-time streaming event-driven parsing for downstream processes such as catalog integration test coverage and fallback handling.

functional_units.name: Console Formatter Integration
functional_units.description: Adds a console formatter to the inspect command, displaying validation summaries in the CLI pipeline.
